subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Torii Hunter went 0 for 3 to run his career-long drought against Roger Clemens to 0 for 25 as Clemens and the Yankees prevailed at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: Torii Hunter went 0 for 3 to run his career-long drought against Roger Clemens to 0 for 25 as Clemens and the Yankees prevailed at Yankee Stadium.
